Citadel’s Indian spin-off gets a title;.content: On Tuesday, Prime Video India released the first poster of the upcoming series, revealing its title as, Citadel: Honey Bunny.In a statement, Prime Video India described Citadel: Honey Bunny as having "a riveting narrative that fuses the pulse-pounding elements of a gritty spy action thriller with the heartwarming allure of a love story, all set against the vibrant tapestry of the 90s.With the latest announcement of Citadel: Honey Bunny, fans were reassured that the Indian series is not a remake but a spin-off, offering a unique storyline within the Citadel universe.Other than Citadel: Honey Bunny, Varun is currently working on a remake of Atlee's 2016 Tamil film Theri, titled Baby John.Created by the Russo Brothers, Citadel made its debut on Prime Video in April last year, featuring Richard Madden and Priyanka Chopra as elite agents in the spy agency Citadel.

Extraordinary Attorney Woo's Kang Tae-oh.content: Actor Kang Tae-oh, known for his role in Extraordinary Attorney Woo, has completed his military service and was discharged on Tuesday.The actor, who entered the South Korean military in September 2022, expressed gratitude for his time in the service and revealed that he fixed his bad habits and earned only good things.During his military service, Tae-oh participated in significant events, including reading the memorandum at the 2023 memorial service on Hyeonchungil (Memorial Day in South Korea) and serving as an assistant instructor for the Recruit Training Centre.In a note shared with fans, Tae-oh stated, "I enlisted after receiving great love from everyone after wrapping up 'Extraordinary Attorney Woo'." I faced the end of my 20s and the start of my 30s in the military, and it was a meaningful time during which I fixed my bad habits and learned only good things.

James Burton, John Anderson and Toby Kei.content: James Burton, John Anderson and Toby Keith on Monday became the newest members to join the Country Music Hall of Fame.“Florida native John Anderson helped steer Country Music back to its traditions with his bold honky-tonk style,” said Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum CEO Kyle Young in a statement.The Country Music Association announced the 2024 inductees in Nashville, Tennessee, with Burton, a guitarist who was Elvis Presley’s band leader, entering in the recording/touring musician category.For Anderson, the country icon has enjoyed a sweeping discography spanning more than 40 years — with particular breakout fame in the 1970s and 1990s.“So much of my career was spent playing for incredible country artists and to now be going up on that wall with all those innovators and industry greats is just incredible,” Burton said.

That 'jam jar' story on how Shakira foun.content: In a recent interview, Shakira, 47, finally put to rest rumours surrounding the jam jar as a reason for her split from former partner Gerard Piqué, 37.At the height of the news of Shakira's splitsville saga, there was a 'jam jar' story: that she found out about former partner Gerard Piqué's infidelity after finding an empty jam jar in the kitchen.The former couple, who publicly ended their 11-year romance in June 2022, share two sons, Milan, 11, and Sasha, nine."For a long time I put my career on hold, to be next to Gerard, so he could play football," she told the outlet.In response to inquiries about Piqué's alleged cheating being exposed by a jar of jam, Shakira dismissed the rumour as "not true," providing a straightforward clarification to The Sunday Times.

Former K-pop star Jung Joon-young leaves.content: Former K-pop star Jung Joon-young walked out of prison on Tuesday after serving a five-year sentence for his involvement in a high-profile spycam and rape scandal that shook South Korea."The spycam scandal not only led to legal repercussions for Jung and others involved but also highlighted the broader issue of non-consensual filming and distribution of intimate images and videos in South Korea.The scandal has continued to reverberate in South Korea, with international footballer Hwang Ui-jo currently under investigation for allegedly filming sexual encounters without consent."Jung, wearing a black hat and mask, left the prison in Mokpo, approximately 350 kilometres (218 miles) south of Seoul, without speaking to the press on Tuesday morning, according to News1 agency.Another K-pop star, Seungri, a former member of the popular boy band BIGBANG, was also implicated in the scandal.

Sophie Turner seeks to reactivate divorc.content: Following a successful mediation in October 2023, Turner and Jonas issued a joint statement affirming their commitment to co-parenting, with plans for their children to split time between homes in the US and the UK.In a joint message shared on Instagram, the couple stated in September 2023, "After four wonderful years of marriage we have mutually decided to amicably end our marriage.The former couple, who tied the knot in May 2019, initiated divorce proceedings in September 2023, with Jonas filing for dissolution of marriage in Miami after four years together.We look forward to being great co-parents," the former couple said in a joint statement.In January, Turner dropped the wrongful retention claims after both stars signed a consent plan approved by a UK judge, leading to the dismissal of the filing "with prejudice, and without attorneys’ fees, expenses, costs and/or disbursements awarded to either party".

Alex Garland's Civil War to release in I.content: Speaking on the film, Alex said that he wanted to make journalists the heroes in Civil War because in “every democracy they aren’t a luxury, but a necessity.Blue election year, A24‘s Civil War promises to make you face harsh realities of a world where we have forgotten what living in a democracy feels like.Set in the dystopian future, the film will be depicting the harrowing and senseless realities of war.This gritty, war-torn film boasts an impressive ensemble cast, including Wagner Moura, Cailee Spaeny, Stephen McKinley Henderson, and Jesse Plemons.In the film, Academy Award nominee Kirsten Dunst plays a jaded photojournalist documenting the end of democracy as we know it in what's sure to be one of the year’s most controversial films.

Here's how Russian media outlets reporte.content: "Finally, Russian state news agency Tass' newsflash came which read, “King Charles III continues to perform his official duties and attend private engagements" and placed an end to all rumours.It was on Monday afternoon (Mar 18) that the news of British monarch King Charles III's death broke in the Russian media.The news shared carried a photo of King Charles wearing a ceremonial military uniform, and the caption read, “British King Charles III has died".The news soon went viral across Russian internet channels, which included Readovka, a pro-Kremlin Telegram channel that has more than 2.This disinformation spread by Russian media soon went viral with no one really verifying the details of the news as well as its source.

Singer R. Kelly seeks appeals court reli.content: She said it wasn’t fair that prosecutors charged Kelly, 57, with leading a Racketeer Influenced and Corrupt Organization (RICO) enterprise from 1994 to 2018 compromised of individuals who promoted his music and recruited women and girls to engage in illegal sexual activity and to produce child pornography.Kelly’s lawyer told an appeals court Monday that all kinds of legitimate organizations — even college fraternities — could be deemed racketeering organizations under a law used to convict the R&B superstar at his Brooklyn trial of sexually abusing young fans, including children, for decades.Attorney Kayla Bensing said Kelly’s network of aides and employees were part of the singer’s “system in place that lured young people in to his orbit” before he “took over their lives.Widespread outrage over Kelly’s sexual misconduct didn’t emerge until the #MeToo reckoning, reaching a crescendo after the release of the documentary “Surviving R.“So this is all evidence that the jury was entitled to infer that Kelly’s inner circle knew what was going on.

Movie armorer challenges conviction in f.content: A movie set armourer is challenging her conviction on an involuntary manslaughter charge in the fatal shooting of a cinematographer by Alec Baldwin on the set of the Western film Rust, court records released Monday show.Baldwin was indicted by a grand jury in January and has pleaded not guilty to an involuntary manslaughter charge, with trial set for July.Prosecutors blamed Gutierrez-Reed at a two-week trial for unwittingly bringing live ammunition onto the set of Rust where it was expressly prohibited.Defence attorneys for Rust armourer Hannah Gutierrez-Reed filed a request for a new trial and urged a judge to release the defendant from jail as deliberations proceed.Gutierrez-Reed was convicted by a jury this month in the shooting on the outskirts of Santa Fe, New Mexico, during a rehearsal in October 2021.

Stormy documentary: 7 jaw-dropping revel.content: The documentary captures the fallout between Daniels and her hush money case attorney, Michael Avenatti, who filed a defamation suit against Trump without her consent.Here are seven jaw-dropping revelations made in the documentary, shedding light on the enduring repercussions of her decision to speak out:Stormy Daniels' decision to speak out on 60 Minutes with Anderson Cooper was not driven by financial gain.Amidst the turmoil, Daniels found an unlikely ally in Michael Cohen, Trump's former attorney, who expressed genuine concern for her safety following Trump's indictment in 2023 for the hush money scandal.In a new documentary released on Peacock titled Stormy, the actress-turned-director delves deep into the tumultuous aftermath of her revelation about a sexual encounter with Trump before the 2016 presidential election.Former porn star Stephanie Clifford, widely known as Stormy Daniels, is back to share her riveting account of the 2018 scandal involving former President Donald Trump that rocked the political world.

Jewish celebs issue letter denouncing Zo.content:
Filmmaker Jonathan Glazer’s Oscars speech after his film The Zone of Interest won the Best International Feature Film award has come under the scanner with strong reactions emerging from factions of the Jewish community in the US and other areas.After his film won Best International Feature Film, Jonathan read out a profound speech in which he thanked the Academy and his partners for making the film a reality.”“Our film shows where dehumanization leads at its worst…
We stand here as men who refute their Jewishness & the Holocaust being hijacked by an occupation which has led to conflict, for so many innocent people.They feel that Jonathan’s speech which decried the “dehumanisation” of the October 7 attack on Israel by Hamas was out of place.It won the Best Foreign Film award but was also in the race for Best Picture which ultimately was awarded to Oppenheimer by Christopher Nolan.

Ariana Grande's We Can't Be Friends debu.content: Ariana Grande’s latest song “We Can’t Be Friends” is already a hit as the single debuted at no 1 on Billboard Hot 100, becoming her ninth song to become a chartbuster on its release.“We Can’t Be Friends” is the second single from Ariana’s seventh LP, Eternal Sunshine, which launched at no 1 on the Billboard Hot 200.In addition to Ariana Grande, Max Martin who wrote and produced along with the hit songmaker has now become among the most successful producers in the chart’s history with the most Hot 100 no 1s.This is her seventh no 1 debut and ninth Hot 100 no 1.Ariana Grande now tops the list of female singers with the most number 1 debuts on Billboard charts, surpassing Taylor Swift.

Mukesh Khanna strongly refutes reports o.content: Not only did he shut down the rumours, but he also questioned Ranveer's demeanour, saying that no matter how big star Ranveer is, he can't play the role of Shaktimaan.And, in recent days, we have seen a few rumours going around over who will portray the role of the superhero Shaktimaan in the movie.In an Instagram post that has now been deleted, Khanna said, ''From the last few months, rumours have it that Ranveer Singh will play the role of Shaktimaan.And, I have said that no matter how big a star he is, a person with that kind of image can never play the role of Shaktimaan.Now, the actor who takes on the role should have the quality that when he speaks, people will listen.

Indian actress Arundhathi Nair on ventil.content: Tamil and Malayalam actor Arundhathi Nair is currently battling for her life after being involved in a tragic accident, which reportedly occurred on March 14 and left the actor critically injured.She stated, "We felt the need to clarify the news reported in Tamil Nadu's newspapers and television channels.Her television credits include the Malayalam show Kerala Samajam (2019-20), and she has also appeared in the Malayalam web series Padmini (2021) and the Tamil show Don’t Think (2021).Arundhathi Nair made her acting debut in 2014 with the Tamil film Pongi Ezhu Manohara and went on to feature in films like Saithan and Pistha.Since the news broke, an outpouring of support and prayers has flooded social media, with fans expressing their hopes for Arundhathi's speedy recovery.

Kate Middleton spotted in public, onlook.content: While the princess has not made any official public outings, she has been spotted outside the palace two times since her January abdominal surgery.Amid the talks around the Princess of Wales' whereabouts, she has been reportedly spotted outside her Windsor home.In January, Buckingham Palace said that the Princess of Wales underwent abdominal surgery, without revealing the exact details of her surgery.The outing comes after a lot of drama that emerged after the edited photo of Princess Kate Middleton and her three children was shared on the UK's Mother's Day.Kate Middleton and her mysterious absence have sparked a lot of debate and wild conspiracy theories that refuse to die down.

CBFC alters Tabu’s dialogues in Crew, as.content: Crew trailer:On Saturday (March 16), the first trailer of the movie was dropped and it took us into the rollercoaster life of three flight attendants, Tabu, Kareena and Kriti.Released on March 17, the trailer of Crew created a lot of buzz online, with people going berserk over Kriti Sanon, Kareena Kapoor Khan and Tabu's fun chemistry.In another part of the trailer, Tabu says the word “ha****ada”, which will be edited out, and replaced with the word “ameerzada”.However, now it seems like the Central Board of Film Certification (CBFC) didn't like the trailer so much, as they went on to alter some of the objectionable dialogues in the movie.At the end of the trailer, Tabu's character says “Baith ch***ye” to a passenger.

Oscar-winning screenwriter David Seidler.content: Aghassi remarked, "David was in the place he loved most in the world - New Zealand - doing what gave him the greatest peace, which was fly fishing.Seidler's long-time manager, Jeff Aghassi, confirmed the news in a statement, revealing that the esteemed writer was indulging in one of his greatest passions, fly-fishing, in the country he adored most.Renowned screenwriter David Seidler, best known for penning the Oscar-winning film The King's Speech, has tragically passed away at the age of 86 while vacationing in New Zealand."For those unaware, fly fishing is a technique that uses artificial flies to catch fish, typically in fresh or saltwater.David Seidler's untimely demise leaves a void in the entertainment industry, but his legacy as a gifted storyteller and his profound impact on audiences around the world will endure for generations to come.

Alpha Beta Gamma director on experimenti.content: Answer: How the characters of Alpha Beta Gamma navigate this complex journey of love and life, is what the story, the movie is about.After a well-deserved kickstart at various film festivals of the world including the Cannes Film Festival 2022, the Hindi language drama film Alpha Beta Gamma released in theatres in India on March 8.Produced under the banner of Chotee Film Productions' & ‘Knownsense Entertainment, Alpha Beta Gamma is presented by 70mm Talkies, Samant Chauhan and Agastya Jain.As the trailer reveals, the three principal characters are like these particles, an Alpha, a Beta, and a Gamma particle and the situation they are in, is the nuclear reactor.Answer: Frankly, when we made Alpha Beta Gamma, none of us expected such a journey.
